abstract: For her book "Windows on Central Park," Betsy Pinover Schiff took photographs from hotels, apartments and at least one bathroom.
snippet: For her book "Windows on Central Park," Betsy Pinover Schiff took photographs from hotels, apartments and at least one bathroom.
lead_paragraph: Betsy Pinover Schiff took some photographs that did not make it into her new book. Consider the ones from the apartment where the owner led her into the bedroom and told her, "I don't want my wife to know about this."

headline.main: A View of Central Park, or 100 of Them
